# inputView

**Instance Property**

The primary view for the input view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var inputView: UIInputView? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When you use an input view controller subclass as the primary view controller for a custom keyboard, this property’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIInputView] object is initially empty. To display your keyboard’s user interface, add controls and views to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIInputViewController/inputView] property.
